DOC.HEAD: Eds: Updates revised NYSE index in last graf
NEW YORK: credit policy.
DOC.TEXT: The Dow Jones average of 30 industrials, down 2.13 on Tuesday, gained 15.14 to 2,724.40. Advancing issues outnumbered declines by about 5 to 3 on the New York Stock Exchange, with 931 up, 549 down and 476 unchanged. Big Board volume totaled 133.73 million shares, up from 77.61 million in the previous session. The NYSE's composite index rose .97 to 192.69.
